Lack enough support: The claim that Senator Chuck Schumer has a concealed weapons permit lacks evidence to support it.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the provided image of Schumer firing a gun in 1994 was related to a demonstration against assault weapons and not his own firearm or concealed carry permit.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that because Schumer fired a gun in a demonstration against assault weapons, he must have a concealed weapons permit.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image of Schumer firing a gun was part of a demonstration against assault weapons and not related to his own concealed carry permit.
